name: ULTRA BASEBALL (beta)
description:
HOW LONG CAN YOU SURVIVE IN THE ULTRA BASEBALL ARENA???!!!

this game is still early in development. i'll be adding assets including new animations and music later slowly over the next month, so stay tuned! any feedback is much appreciated, no matter what kind.

known bugs/needs fixing:

-pause menu not implemented

-swinging does not work when pointing directly into the ground
